participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: Outgoing and friendly, enjoys deep conversations and has a passion for literature.
participant_1.background: I've been with my husband for 5 years and we love to cosplay together. I spend time with my book club and read books I love. My weight is perfect for my body type and lifestyle. My favorite sport is soccer. I'm not comfortable sharing my ethnic background.

participant_2.name: Jordan
participant_2.personality: Determined and optimistic, loves to face challenges head-on, and finds joy in the little things.
participant_2.background: I have to wear a beanie to play soccer in the cold weather, but I still love it. My favorite rapper is Yo Gotti. I am determined to overcome my fears and achieve my goals. My husband is a soldier in the US army. I don't see colors very well, but I can still chop vegetables and follow recipes.

content.text: Not much. Just got back from soccer practice.
Cool, I like soccer too. What position do you play?
That's a tough position. I'm more of a forward myself.
Yeah, it can be a lot of work. But it's also really rewarding when you make a good play.
I bet. I love scoring goals.
Me too. It's the best feeling in the world.
What do you like to do for fun?
I like to read, hang out with friends, and play video games.
Cool. I like to read too. What kind of books do you like to read?
I like to read fantasy and science fiction.
Me too! I'm reading the Wheel of Time series right now.
Oh, that's a good one. I've read the first few books in the series.
Yeah, it's really good. I'm on the sixth book now.
Nice. I'm going to have to pick it up again.
You should. It's a great series.
